label: Car Warranty and Protection
description: Products and services related to car warranties and protection, including paint protection, rust proofing, and extended warranties.
intents: Protect my car from rust and damage
Get extended warranty for my car

subcategories.label: Extended Car Warranty
subcategories.description: Warranties that extend beyond the manufacturer's warranty period.

subcategories.label: Car Paint Protection
subcategories.description: Products and services that protect a car's paint from damage.

subcategories.label: Rust Proofing
subcategories.description: Products and services that protect a car's underbody from rust.

subcategories.label: Car Protection Film
subcategories.description: Films that protect a car's exterior from scratches and damage.

subcategories.label: Upholstery Protection
subcategories.description: Products and services that protect a car's upholstery from stains and damage.
